attributes.action: Stop public funding of the BBC
attributes.additional_details: When it was just BBC BBC2 and ITV maybe the licence fee was valid, now with so many channels to choose from the BBC has become irrelevant as a major broadcaster, its outdated and institutionalised, a dinosaur from a long gone age.
attributes.background: This privileged dinosaur from a long gone age has outlived its usefulness, it should like every other media provider fund itself. Greed and secrecy seem to be its watchword, cover up is its specialty. Public funds can be better used.
